rule: Each part-of-speech tag returned by the chatbot must exactly match one of the tags provided in the alphabetical list, including the correct casing and abbreviation.
complianceText:
The output provided is "am - VBP". According to the description, the chatbot is supposed to supply only the part-of-speech tag for a given word, without any additional information or context. The output "am - VBP" includes two components separated by a dash: the word "am" and the tag "VBP". The proper output should only include the part-of-speech tag, "VBP", without including the word itself or any symbols like a dash. The inclusion of additional text beyond the tag constitutes a violation of the chatbot's description, which explicitly states to return only the tag.
